name: 500 words left
description:
A bored jackal comes across a lady sitting inside an hourglass. 
“I have only five hundred words to live,” she says. 

This game features:

  • ~ 800 words
  • 2 endings
  • 1 CG
  • 1 music track
  • fun at parties dog trivia
  • not fun at parties art theory trivia

made by mossinasi using the renpy engine and music by peritune
